FAQ.DESCRIPTION: We have compiled the most frequently asked questions from our investors to provide you with all the information you need before starting your investment journey with us.

PREGUNTAS.PREGUNTA: What are the requirements to invest?

RESPUESTA.TITLE: To invest with Nexus Private Capital, you must meet the following requirements:
RESPUESTA.LIST2: Have the minimum required capital according to the selected investment strategy.
RESPUESTA.LIST3: Complete the registration and identity verification process.

PREGUNTAS.PREGUNTA: How long does the capital need to stay invested?

RESPUESTA.TITLE: The investment period varies depending on the chosen strategy:
RESPUESTA.LIST3: Long-term: From 1 year, with the possibility of strategic renewals.

PREGUNTAS.PREGUNTA: How and when are returns paid out?

RESPUESTA.TITLE: The returns generated are paid according to the selected investment plan:
RESPUESTA.LIST3: Annually: Full return paid at the end of the fiscal year.

EXTRA_ITEM.TITLE: Payment Methods:
EXTRA_ITEM.LIST2: Other payment options depending on the country and applicable regulations.

PREGUNTAS.PREGUNTA: What risks exist, and how are they managed?

RESPUESTA.TITLE: All investments carry risks, but at Nexus Private Capital, we implement advanced risk management strategies to minimize them.
RESPUESTA.LIST1: Asset Diversification: We invest in multiple sectors to mitigate volatility.
RESPUESTA.LIST2: Real-Time Analysis: We constantly evaluate the market to adjust strategies.
RESPUESTA.LIST3: Optimized Investment Models: Based on data analysis and financial trends.
RESPUESTA.LIST4: Contingency Plans: We adjust investment positions based on the economic context.

EXTRA_ITEM.TITLE: We have control measures and audits in place to ensure the security of the invested capital.
